title: Create secure login system with multi-factor authentication
description: As a customer, I want to securely log into my account using multi-factor authentication, so that I can protect my sensitive information.
acceptance_criteria:
1. User login must support multi-factor authentication methods.
2. The system should integrate with identity verification services.
test_cases: Given a user with valid credentials, When the user attempts to log in, Then the system should require additional authentication through MFA.

title: Develop a personalized, dynamic dashboard
description: As a customer, I want a dashboard tailored to my profile and preferences, so that I can easily access relevant account information and services.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Dashboard adapts to user’s profile and preferences.
2. Displays relevant account details, product offers, and services.
test_cases: Given a user logged in, When the user accesses the dashboard, Then the system should present personalized content based on user’s profile.

title: Implement a responsive UI framework
description: As a customer, I want a seamless and consistent interface across all my devices, so that I can navigate and use the portal without issues.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Interface is consistent and responsive on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
2. UI meets accessibility standards and performs optimally.
test_cases: Given a user on any device, When navigating the portal, Then the interface should be responsive and provide a seamless experience.

epic_title: Self-Service Account and Service Request Workflows
title: Enable self-service account opening
description: As a customer, I want to open a new account online using a guided workflow, so that I can complete the process with minimal effort.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Workflow guides the user through the account opening process.
2. Users can save incomplete applications for later completion.
test_cases: Given a user initiating account opening, When following the workflow, Then the user should be able to complete the process or save progress.

title: Provide real-time status tracking and notifications
description: As a customer, I want to receive real-time updates on my requests, so that I can stay informed about their status.
acceptance_criteria:
1. System provides real-time status updates for requests.
2. Automated email notifications are sent for status changes.
test_cases: Given a user with an ongoing request, When the request status changes, Then the system should update the status dashboard and send an email alert.

epic_title: User Interaction History and Activity Records
title: Maintain interaction history for compliance
description: As a customer, I want access to a detailed log of my interactions, so that I can review my activities for transparency and compliance.
acceptance_criteria:
1. System captures and stores detailed records of user actions.
2. Users can access their interaction history securely.
test_cases: Given a user with historical interactions, When accessing the activity log, Then the system should display a detailed and secure history of actions.

title: Integrate portal with core banking systems
description: As a developer, I want the portal functions to seamlessly integrate with core banking infrastructure, so that data exchange is accurate and reliable.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Integration allows real-time data synchronization.
2. System maintains a decoupled architecture for performance.
test_cases: Given core banking systems, When data exchange occurs, Then the integration should work seamlessly and maintain data integrity.

epic_title: Role-Based Access Control and Security Governance
title: Implement role-based access control
description: As an administrator, I want to manage access control based on user roles, so that I can ensure data protection and compliance.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Access control system governs user permissions based on roles.
2. System includes audit trails for security reviews.
test_cases: Given users with various roles, When accessing the system, Then the system should enforce access controls and log actions for auditing.
